quality_assessment: Excellent - comprehensive troubleshooting guide with accurate implementation references, working examples, and valid cross-references
positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of common retry configuration issues
Each issue includes symptoms, causes, and solutions with code examples
Accurate source code references with line numbers (e.g., src/cook/retry_v2.rs:128-149)
Good use of YAML examples showing both problematic and corrected configurations
Well-structured debugging workflow at the end
All cross-references to sibling subsections are valid and working
Clear explanations of retry_budget behavior with concrete examples
Error matcher matching logic correctly documented as case-insensitive
Jitter configuration explained with MapReduce thundering herd scenario
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a 'Quick Diagnostic Checklist' section at the top for rapid issue identification
Could include a troubleshooting decision tree diagram to help users navigate to relevant sections
Might benefit from adding actual log output examples showing what users would see for each issue
Consider adding a section on troubleshooting retry behavior in MapReduce workflows specifically

retry_budget_behavior.notes: Budget checked before each retry, delay-only calculation confirmed

circuit_breaker.notes: Threshold and recovery timeout behavior matches documentation

jitter_application.notes: Jitter factor application matches documented behavior

topics_covered: Issue: Retries Happening But Taking Too Long
Issue: Thundering Herd (Multiple Parallel Agents Retrying Simultaneously)
